name: Sod's'Law
description:
Jump into a flying car and punish all those criminals plaguing the streets of your home town!

Sod’s Law is an interactive history of an experienced policeman tired of crimes left not investigated and unpunished. He decided to handle it himself, picked up his partner and flew away in his car, shooting the bad guys.

Kill monsters and loot useful weapons and specific items which will help you in defeating the level bosses - and believe us, those are tough guys! Upgrade your car and buy new stuff in the garage. Interact with your partner - he’s not as dumb as he seems to be!


Features:
Multiple levels with unique enemies
Upgrading car and weapons to improve your firepower
Buying items in the Garage
Easy controls: just fly and shoot!

This game is a perfect mixture of a retro arcade shooter and cybertech madness. Each level has its unique atmosphere, and the boss battles are as thrilling as they are hard. Try your skills in shooting in Sod’s Law!
